posts.title: json-server
posts.content: The shortcomings of using a json-server for react demonstrations can be seen almost anywhere.
posts.author: typicode

posts.title: React Hooks
posts.content: Should I be using React Hooks? Everyone says yes, but after more than two years trying, I don't think so. Hooks sacrifice clarity for simplicity. Prop Drilling can be avoided with a proper Redux setup, a good pattern, and simple components.
posts.author: typicode
